item.text:
ERROR:
The Protheus.doc was not filled or it has errors.

EXAMPLE:
/*/{Protheus.doc}
@type function
/*/

ERROR:
The Parameter @param was not filled correctly. The Name, Type and Description must be separated by ,

FILLING FORMAT:
Inside the Protheus.Doc: @param param_name, param_type, param_description.

ERROR:
The Parameter @param was not informed. The Parameter Card will not be filled in the Documentation.

FILLING FORMAT:
Inside the Protheus.Doc: @param param_name, param_type, param_description.

ERROR:
The Parameter @return was not filled correctly. The Name, Type and Description must be separated by ,

FILLING FORMAT:
Inside the Protheus.Doc: @return return_name, return_type, return_description.

ERROR:
The Parameter @return was not informed. The Return Card will not be filled in the Documentation.

FILLING FORMAT:
Inside the Protheus.Doc: @return return_name, return_type, return_description.
